CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 13, 1953, pg. 16, reads: "CROWD AT COURIER'S HOME SERVICE FAIR...overflow crowds come to inspect booths, take away prizes, and be entertained."
TitMainTitle: Crowd seated in Ammon Center with Pepsi-Cola, West Auto Body, and Crayton's booths in background, for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
